  • Method Details

    • deleteFeature

      public WriteFeaturesApi.DeleteFeatureAdapter deleteFeature(String hrn, String layerId, String featureId, Optional<String> context)
      Deletes an existing feature.

      Path: /layers/{layerId}/features/{featureId}

      Method: DELETE

      Expected answers:

      code 204 : String (An empty response as a result of a user-request with accepted MIME type application/x-empty.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 401 : Error (Unauthorized to perform the request.)

      code 403 : Error (Forbidden request. Insufficient rights to perform the request.)

      code 404 : Error (Not found.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      Parameters:
      hrn - The HERE Resource Name (HRN) of the catalog.
      layerId - The unique identifier of the layer.
      featureId - The unique identifier of a feature in the layer.
      context - The context where the operation will be performed on a composite layer. If not specified, the operation occurs based on the extension rules. For additional information, see Layer.extends. Available context are: |Context|Description| |-------|-----------| |default|The default value if none is given. For composite layers the operation occurs based on the extension rules. For normal layers this is the only valid context.| |extension|The operation will be executed only in the extension and no operation will be performed in the extended layer.| |super|Only applicable for read-operations. The operation will be executed only in the layer being extended (super layer).|

    • deleteFeature

      public WriteFeaturesApi.DeleteFeatureBuilder deleteFeature()

    • deleteFeatures

      public WriteFeaturesApi.DeleteFeaturesAdapter deleteFeatures(String hrn, String layerId, List<String> id, Optional<String> context)
      Delete the features with the provided ids.

      Path: /layers/{layerId}/features

      Method: DELETE

      Expected answers:

      code 200 : FeatureCollectionModification (An array of features and their modifications response.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 204 : String (An empty response as a result of a user-request with accepted MIME type application/x-empty.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 401 : Error (Unauthorized to perform the request.)

      code 403 : Error (Forbidden request. Insufficient rights to perform the request.)

      code 404 : Error (Not found.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      Parameters:
      hrn - The HERE Resource Name (HRN) of the catalog.
      layerId - The unique identifier of the layer.
      id - A comma separated list of unique feature identifiers. These are the acceptable formats for this field: * id=value1,value2 * id=value1,id=value2
      context - The context where the operation will be performed on a composite layer. If not specified, the operation occurs based on the extension rules. For additional information, see Layer.extends. Available context are: |Context|Description| |-------|-----------| |default|The default value if none is given. For composite layers the operation occurs based on the extension rules. For normal layers this is the only valid context.| |extension|The operation will be executed only in the extension and no operation will be performed in the extended layer.| |super|Only applicable for read-operations. The operation will be executed only in the layer being extended (super layer).|

    • deleteFeatures

      public WriteFeaturesApi.DeleteFeaturesBuilder deleteFeatures()

    • patchFeature

      public WriteFeaturesApi.PatchFeatureAdapter patchFeature(String hrn, String layerId, String featureId, com.here.platform.data.client.base.generated.scaladsl.model.interactive.Feature feature)
      Patches an existing feature.

      Path: /layers/{layerId}/features/{featureId}

      Method: PATCH

      Expected answers:

      code 200 : Feature (A feature response.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 400 : Error (Malformed or Bad Request.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 401 : Error (Unauthorized to perform the request.)

      code 403 : Error (Forbidden request. Insufficient rights to perform the request.)

      code 404 : Error (Not found.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 409 : Error (An error response which indicates a conflict.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 413 : Error (Request entity too large.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 513 : Error (Response payload too large.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      Parameters:
      hrn - The HERE Resource Name (HRN) of the catalog.
      layerId - The unique identifier of the layer.
      featureId - The unique identifier of a feature in the layer.
      feature - A feature request.

    • patchFeature

      public WriteFeaturesApi.PatchFeatureBuilder patchFeature()

    • postFeatures

      public WriteFeaturesApi.PostFeaturesAdapter postFeatures(String hrn, String layerId, com.here.platform.data.client.base.generated.scaladsl.model.interactive.FeatureCollection featureCollection)
      Create or patch features.

      Path: /layers/{layerId}/features

      Method: POST

      Expected answers:

      code 200 : FeatureCollectionModification (An array of features and their modifications response.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 204 : String (An empty response as a result of a user-request with accepted MIME type application/x-empty.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 400 : Error (Malformed or Bad Request.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 401 : Error (Unauthorized to perform the request.)

      code 403 : Error (Forbidden request. Insufficient rights to perform the request.)

      code 404 : Error (Not found.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 409 : Error (An error response which indicates a conflict.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 413 : Error (Request entity too large.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 513 : Error (Response payload too large.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      Parameters:
      hrn - The HERE Resource Name (HRN) of the catalog.
      layerId - The unique identifier of the layer.
      featureCollection - A FeatureCollection object or a FeatureModificationList object.

      public WriteFeaturesApi.PutFeatureAdapter putFeature(String hrn, String layerId, String featureId, com.here.platform.data.client.base.generated.scaladsl.model.interactive.Feature feature)
      Creates or replaces a feature in the layer.

      Path: /layers/{layerId}/features/{featureId}

      Method: PUT

      Expected answers:

      code 200 : Feature (A feature response.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 400 : Error (Malformed or Bad Request.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 401 : Error (Unauthorized to perform the request.)

      code 403 : Error (Forbidden request. Insufficient rights to perform the request.)

      code 409 : Error (An error response which indicates a conflict.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 413 : Error (Request entity too large.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 513 : Error (Response payload too large.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      Parameters:
      hrn - The HERE Resource Name (HRN) of the catalog.
      layerId - The unique identifier of the layer.
      featureId - The unique identifier of a feature in the layer.
      feature - A feature request.

    • putFeatures

      public WriteFeaturesApi.PutFeaturesAdapter putFeatures(String hrn, String layerId, com.here.platform.data.client.base.generated.scaladsl.model.interactive.FeatureCollection featureCollection)
      Create or replace the provided features.

      Path: /layers/{layerId}/features

      Method: PUT

      Expected answers:

      code 200 : FeatureCollectionModification (An array of features and their modifications response.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 204 : String (An empty response as a result of a user-request with accepted MIME type application/x-empty.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 400 : Error (Malformed or Bad Request.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 401 : Error (Unauthorized to perform the request.)

      code 403 : Error (Forbidden request. Insufficient rights to perform the request.)

      code 404 : Error (Not found.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 409 : Error (An error response which indicates a conflict.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 413 : Error (Request entity too large.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 513 : Error (Response payload too large.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      Parameters:
      hrn - The HERE Resource Name (HRN) of the catalog.
      layerId - The unique identifier of the layer.
      featureCollection - A feature collection request.
